name: furnace
look_description: The furnace is a large cast iron oven. Black smoke pours out of the open door on the front of the furnace, while a fire rages inside. You stop and wonder who could have possibly been keeping this furnace running in a seemingly abandoned house. You can't think of any reason why the furnace would be on. That doesn't exactly make you feel any better about your current situation.

touch.text: You decide against touching the furnace as it would definitely burn your hands off.

smell.text: It smells like smoke. This would be comforting if anyone was actually living here...

turn off.text: You can't seem to turn the furnace off.
